== Kuruvilassery (627916) ==

Kuruvilassery is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 617 hectares and harbouring 2230 households with total population of 8653 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 18 km. Male population is 4058 and female population is 4595. Scheduled Caste Population is 1047 and Scheduled Tribes population is 20. Census Location Code of the village is 627916<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
